name: Expedia Cenote VR
description: Explore the Cenote in Expedia Labs VR. The experience takes you into the caves of similar cenotes that are found in the Yucatan Peninsula. Although a simulation of the true experience, you can learn facts and where you could find real cenotes if you wish to travel in the future.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or Higher Processor: Intel i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1080 Storage: 5 GB available space
